alerts.clearReset: This will clear the whole canvas. Are you sure?
alerts.couldNotCopyToClipboard: Couldn't copy to clipboard. Try using Chrome browser.
alerts.uploadedSecurly: The upload has been secured with end-to-end encryption, which means that Excalidraw server and third parties can't read the content.

toolBar.lock: Keep selected tool active after drawing

hints.linearElement: Click to start multiple points, drag for single line
hints.linearElementMulti: Click on last point or press Escape or Enter to finish
hints.resize: You can constraint proportions by holding SHIFT while resizing

errorSplash.clearCanvasMessage: Εάν το παραπάνω δεν δουλέψει, προσπαθήστε
errorSplash.clearCanvasCaveat: Αυτό θα προκαλέσει απώλεια της δουλειάς σας
errorSplash.openIssueMessage_pre: Before doing so, we'd appreciate if you opened an issue on our
errorSplash.openIssueMessage_post: Please include the following error stack trace (and if it's not private, also the scene content):

roomDialog.desc_intro: Μπορείτε να προσκαλέσετε άλλους να δουλέψουν μαζί σας.
roomDialog.desc_privacy: Μην ανησυχείτε, η συνεδρία χρησιμοποιεί κρυπτογράφηση από σημείο σε σημείο, άρα οτιδήποτε κάνετε θα παραμείνει ανοιχτό μόνο σε εσάς. Ούτε οι μηχανές μας μπορούν να δουν τι κάνατε.
roomDialog.desc_inProgressIntro: Η ζωντανή συνεργασία με άλλους είναι σε ενεργή.
roomDialog.desc_persistenceWarning: Note that the scene data is shared across collaborators in a P2P fashion, and not persisted to our server. Thus, if all of you disconnect, you will loose the data unless you export it to a file or a shareable link.
roomDialog.desc_shareLink: Μοιραστείτε τον σύνδεσμο με όποιον θέλετε να δουλέψετε μαζί:
roomDialog.desc_exitSession: Stopping the session will disconnect your from the room, but you'll be able to continue working with the scene, locally. Note that this won't affect other people, and they'll still be able to collaborate on their version.
